presentation.title: Xyaum rau koj qhov kev sib tham ua haujlwm tom ntej!
presentation.message:
Puas muaj kev xam phaj haujlwm tau koj ntshai thiab ntxhov siab?
Tej zaum koj tseem hnov tsis tau npaj rau kev xam phaj haujlwm?
Qhov no yog lub app zoo tshaj los xyaum koj cov kev sib tham sib tham hauv kev sib tham txog kev xam phaj!

presentation.title: Npaj rau koj txoj haujlwm tom ntej!
presentation.message: Txoj hauj lwm Piav qhia txoj haujlwm siv lub zog ntawm kev txawj ntse ua kom muaj kev sib tham txog kev ua haujlwm ntawm kev ua haujlwm ntawm kev ua haujlwm ntawm kev ua haujlwm ntawm kev ua haujlwm ntawm kev ua haujlwm ntawm lub neej tiag tiag.

presentation.title: Hwm Subscription:
presentation.message: Tau txais ib daim ntawv tshaj tawm ntawm qhov kawg ntawm txhua qhov kev sib tham piav qhia qhov kev sib tham nrog cov lus taw qhia thiab cov lus qhia txog yuav ua li cas txhim kho koj txoj kev ntiav tau txais kev xam phaj tiag tiag.

list.title: Rho tawm keeb kwm?
list.message: Koj puas paub tseeb tias koj xav rho tawm tag nrho keeb kwm?

entry.title: Rho tawm kev sib tham?
entry.message: Koj puas paub tseeb tias koj xav rho tawm cov kev sib tham no?

fields.name: Lub npe
fields.job_position_detailed: Cov ncauj lus kom ntxaws txoj haujlwm

validation.title: Kev ua yuam kev siv tau
validation.invalid_fields:
Ntxig ib txoj haujlwm uas tsim nyog uas tau siv rau kev xam phaj haujlwm tshiab.
Ntxiv
validation.unable_to_validate: Tsis tuaj yeem siv tau teb.

color_scheme.name: Tsaus ntsiab lus
color_scheme.description:
Xaiv nruab nrab ntawm lub teeb thiab cov ntsiab lus tsaus.
Cia li muab tso rau hauv lub cuab yeej lub ntsiab lus thawj zaug koj qhib lub app.

language.name: Yam lus
language.description: Xaiv cov lus nyiam ua kom pom thaum siv daim ntawv thov thiab tham nrog AI thaum sib tham.

notifications.saved: Kev nqis tes tau txais kev cawmdim

label.tap_to_retry: Coj mus rhaub kom rov ua haujlwm

cooldown.description:
Daim dawb version ntawm lub app tso cai rau koj los noj ib zaug ib teev.

Yog tias koj xav tshem tawm cov kev txwv, tshem tawm cov kev tshaj tawm, thiab tau txais cov lus qhia tswv yim zoo li cas tom qab kev sib tham, xav txog kev xam phaj.
cooldown.active:
Tos kom muaj kev sib tw ua ntej tsim kev sib tham tshiab.

Yog tias koj xav tshem tawm cov neeg siv tshuaj Khis, tshem tawm cov lus qhia tswv yim, thiab tau txais cov lus qhia tswv yim nrog cov lus qhia yuav ua li cas los txhim kho tom qab kev sib tham, txiav txim siab rau tus hwm.

review.request:
Yog tias koj nyiam lub app, thov txiav txim siab tawm ntawm kev ntsuam xyuas los pab peb.

new_interview.title: Kev xam phaj tshiab muaj!

subscription.invitation: Sau npe yuav ua kom tau zoo
subscription.thanks: Ua tsaug rau koj rau subscribing rau hwm! Peb xav koj hmoov zoo thiab ua tiav txhua yam koj cov lus nug yav tom ntej!

error.subscription: Yuam kev sim siv koj txoj kev yuav khoom.
error.connection:
Kev sib txuas yuam kev.

Tsis tuaj yeem txuas rau lub khw.
error.products: Tsis tuaj yeem tshawb xyuas cov khoom xaiv.
error.subscription_options:
Tsis tuaj yeem thauj cov phiaj xwm kev npaj yuav khoom.

Thov, xyuas koj cov internet txuas, lossis sim dua tom qab.

error.title: Yuam kev
error.unexpected: Ib yam dab tsi mus tsis ncaj ncees lawm ... Koj cov ntaub qhwv tsis pom qhov no! üò±
error.connection_fix: Txheeb xyuas koj cov internet txuas thiab sim dua tom qab.

store.short_description: Xyaum rau koj cov haujlwm xam phaj tom ntej nrog cov neeg tsis muaj tseeb ntawm Ai Simulator
store.full_description:
Puas muaj kev xam phaj haujlwm tau koj ntshai thiab ntxhov siab?
Tej zaum koj tseem hnov tsis tau npaj rau kev xam phaj haujlwm?
Qhov no yog lub app zoo tshaj los xyaum koj cov kev sib tham sib tham hauv kev sib tham txog kev xam phaj!

Txoj hauj lwm Piav qhia txoj haujlwm siv lub zog ntawm kev txawj ntse ua kom muaj kev sib tham txog kev ua haujlwm ntawm kev ua haujlwm ntawm kev ua haujlwm ntawm kev ua haujlwm ntawm lub neej thiab ua kom koj tau txais kev sib tham tom ntej.

Cov kev sib tham tau ua kom haum rau txoj haujlwm txoj haujlwm koj tab tom nrhiav, thiab yuav zoo li tus thiab kho nrog koj cov hom phiaj kom sawv cev rau kev xam phaj haujlwm tiag tiag.

Cov neeg siv hwm tau tseem tau txais ib daim ntawv tshaj tawm ntawm qhov kawg ntawm txhua qhov kev sib tham piav qhia cov lus sib tham thiab cov lus qhia txog kev yuav ua kom koj txoj kev sib tham tau tiag tiag.
taglines: Npaj rau koj txoj haujlwm tom ntej!

Koj txoj kev tshaj lij tom ntej tos koj nyob ntawm no!
